thread.title: Ikea Tests Movable Walls for Cramped Homes
thread.title_full: Ikea Tests Movable Walls for Cramped Homes - WSJ

author: Jens Hansegard
title: Ikea Tests Movable Walls for Cramped Homes
text:
MALMÖ, Sweden—Ikea is seeking to tap into a growing pool of customers: those living in tiny places.
For the past two years, the Swedish furniture company has discreetly refurbished an apartment in this coastal city in southern Sweden to study the habits of households faced with the challenge of boxing their lives into a few small rooms. Several... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
